shortDescription: SQL injection vulnerability in the Kitchen recipe (mv_cooking) extension before 0.4.1 for TYPO3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, as exploited in the wild as of February 2012.
vulnerabilityName: mathieu_vidal mv_cooking Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
